name: Critical Chroniton Levels!
description: Expend Chronitons in order to receive valuable Crew Retrieval rewards!

rewards.name: Quantum Energy
rewards.flavor: Quantum--a mortal term for Q energy--is needed in order to retrieve crew. Quantum will regenerate over time, but the Q can only hold so much at a time. Plan your crew retrieval operations in order to make efficient use of this resource. Quantum can be regenerated instantly in exchange for Dilithium.

participation_rewards.name: ISM
participation_rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM

name: To Boldly Go
description: Complete the Event Objectives to get C.O.P. Kirk!

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

participation_rewards.name: Honor
participation_rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

ship.name: U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701
ship.flavor: A Constitution-class vessel made legend under the command of Captain Kirk. A hardy ship that survived many encounters.

rewards.name: Kirk
rewards.flavor: What does the future hold for the Federation with Kirk? Perhaps not the calmest, but definitely exciting.

milestones.requirement: Level up a Crew from Star Trek: The Original Series 30 times
Level up a Crew from Star Trek: The Original Series 60 times

rewards.name: Kirk
rewards.flavor: What does the future hold for the Federation with Kirk? Perhaps not the calmest, but definitely exciting.

milestones.requirement: Complete 250 Ship Battles using the U.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701

name: Prepare for Voyage Event
description: Get supplies to power up your crew and bolster your Voyages

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

participation_rewards.name: Merits
participation_rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Encounter Skip
rewards.flavor: (Voyage Events Only) Skips 1 upcoming Encounter(s), raises Reward Multiplier as if they were passed flawlessly.

rewards.name: Contest Crit Boost
rewards.flavor: (Voyage Encounters Only) +50 Crit Chance.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Fast Forward
rewards.flavor: Fast forward the remaining Voyage time spending Antimatter until the next Encounter and immediately start the Encounter.

rewards.name: 10x P. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Premium Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Encounter Skip
rewards.flavor: (Voyage Events Only) Skips 2 upcoming Encounter(s), raises Reward Multiplier as if they were passed flawlessly.

rewards.name: Crew Refresh
rewards.flavor: Use to refresh crew in Voyage Encounters or Specialist Event Missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.
